dataset.cmrc module¶

class dataset.cmrc.CMRC(save_path='.')[源代码]¶

基类：object

A set of manually annotated Chinese word-segmentation data and specifications for training and testing a Chinese word-segmentation system for research purposes. For more information please refer to https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=52531

dataset.dataset module¶

class dataset.dataset.InputExample(guid, text_a, text_b=None, label=None)[源代码]¶

基类：object

Input data structure of BERT/ERNIE, can satisfy single sequence task like text classification, sequence lableing; Sequence pair task like dialog task.

class dataset.dataset.SquadExample(qas_id, question_text, doc_tokens, orig_answer_text=None, start_position=None, end_position=None)[源代码]¶

基类：object

A single training/test example for simple sequence classification. For examples without an answer, the start and end position are -1.

A set of manually annotated Chinese word-segmentation data and specifications for training and testing a Chinese word-segmentation system for research purposes. For more information please refer to https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=52531
